summary: A replacer for the iron greatsword. replaces it with Helen\'s Claymore from The anime.
descriptionHtml:
This will replace any and all Iron Longswords with This claymore.

This is a simple replacer for the time being until i get my hands on the creation kit.

This is a very large sword, but it is more or less to scale with the anime.
I plan on making a whole set for most of the characters in the show once the creation kit is released.

the textures are not too great, i am not very good at texturing.

Any Bug reports, Constructive Feedback, or Tips would be greatly appreciated.

Plans for the future;

Clean up the blood texture(make it look better)
adding a better texture.
making it a standalone craftable item and not a replacer.

If anyone is interested in Retexturing or giving me some tips i would gladly appreciate it.
author: Shadowtroop
